name: Devil's Card
description:
A game made in a game jam. 

In the Game you are a man, seeking to kill a demon, his only power is sacred cards which is the only thing to kill the demon and his lackeys.

How to play:
W = Jump
A and D = Move
E = Play the carts
Q = Interaction with menus

Made by:
Marcos Smeets - Programer

@MarcosSmeets5

Mauro Villari - Artist
